description_for_model: serve402 provides pay-per-use web tools for AI agents. Available tools: /fetch (extract content from URLs), /execute (run Python/JS code), /search (web search), /screenshot (capture webpages), /pdf (generate PDFs), /xrpl-query (query XRP Ledger), /dns (DNS lookups), /headers (HTTP headers). All endpoints require x402 micropayment in USDC (Base) or XRP drops (XRPL). Use the OpenAPI spec at /openapi.json for full details.
